String getCurrentDate() {
  struct tm timeinfo;
  if (!getLocalTime(&timeinfo)) {
    return "00-00-0000";  // fallback
  }
  
  strftime(dateStr, sizeof(dateStr), "%d-%m-%Y", &timeinfo);
  return String(dateStr);
}

void setup() {
  Serial.begin(115200);
  EEPROM.begin(EEPROM_SIZE);

  // Pin setup
  pinMode(RELAY1, OUTPUT);
  pinMode(RELAY2, OUTPUT);
  pinMode(TORCH, OUTPUT);
  pinMode(BUZZER, OUTPUT);
  digitalWrite(RELAY1, LOW);
  digitalWrite(RELAY2, LOW);
  digitalWrite(BUZZER, HIGH);

  // OLED initialization
  if (!display.begin(SSD1306_SWITCHCAPVCC, 0x3C)) {
    Serial.println(F("OLED not found"));
    while (true);
  }
  display.clearDisplay();
  display.setTextSize(2);
  display.setTextColor(WHITE);
  display.setCursor(10, 20);
  display.println("Ionic Boost");
  display.display();
  delay(3000);

  display.clearDisplay();
  display.setTextSize(1);
  display.setCursor(0, 0);
  display.println("Starting...");
  display.display();

  // Read system password
  char storedPwd[5];
  for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) storedPwd[i] = EEPROM.read(i);
  storedPwd[4] = '\0';
  sysPassword = String(storedPwd);

  // Read diesel quantity
  char diesel[5];
  for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) diesel[i] = EEPROM.read(60 + i);
  diesel[4] = '\0';
  dieselQty = String(diesel);

  // Read priming time
  char time[3];
  for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++) time[i] = EEPROM.read(64 + i);
  time[2] = '\0';
  primingTime = String(time);

  // Validate dieselQty
  bool dieselValid = (dieselQty.length() == 4);
  for (char c : dieselQty) {
    if (!isDigit(c)) {
      dieselValid = false;
      break;
    }
  }
  if (!dieselValid) {
    dieselQty = "0000";
    for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) EEPROM.write(60 + i, dieselQty[i]);
    EEPROM.commit();
    Serial.println("EEPROM dieselQty initialized");
  }

  // Validate primingTime
  bool timeValid = (primingTime.length() == 2);
  for (char c : primingTime) {
    if (!isDigit(c)) {
      timeValid = false;
      break;
    }
  }
  if (!timeValid) {
    primingTime = "10";
    for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++) EEPROM.write(64 + i, primingTime[i]);
    EEPROM.commit();
    Serial.println("EEPROM primingTime initialized");
  }

  // Read mobile2
  char m2[11];
  for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) m2[i] = EEPROM.read(30 + i);
  m2[10] = '\0';
  mobile2 = String(m2);
  if (mobile2.length() != 10) mobile2 = "8888888888";

  // Read mobile3
  char m3[11];
  for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) m3[i] = EEPROM.read(40 + i);
  m3[10] = '\0';
  mobile3 = String(m3);
  if (mobile3.length() != 10) mobile3 = "9999999999";

  // Read dosing password
  char dPwd[5];
  for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) dPwd[i] = EEPROM.read(50 + i);
  dPwd[4] = '\0';
  dosingPassword = String(dPwd);
  if (dosingPassword.length() != 4 || dosingPassword == "FFFF") dosingPassword = "1234";

  // WiFi & Time Sync
  WiFi.begin(ssid, password);
  Serial.print("Connecting to WiFi");
  while (WiFi.status() != WL_CONNECTED) {
    Serial.print(".");
    delay(500);
  }
  Serial.println();
  Serial.println("Connected to WiFi");

  configTime(19800, 0, "pool.ntp.org", "time.nist.gov"); // IST

  struct tm timeinfo;
  int retries = 0;
  while (!getLocalTime(&timeinfo) && retries < 10) {
    Serial.println("Failed to obtain time");
    delay(1000);
    retries++;
  }

  if (retries < 10) {
    Serial.println("Time sync successful!");
    strftime(dateStr, sizeof(dateStr), "%Y-%m-%d", &timeinfo);
    dosingDateStr = String(dateStr);
    Serial.println("Current Date: " + dosingDateStr);
  } else {
    Serial.println("Time sync failed");
  }

  // Web Server
  server.on("/", handleRoot);
  server.on("/press", handleKeyPress);
  server.begin();

  // MQTT
  mqttClient.setServer(mqtt_server, mqtt_port);
  mqttClient.setBufferSize(512);

  // OLED Final Message
  display.clearDisplay();
  display.setCursor(0, 0);
  display.println("Ionic Boost Ready");
  display.display();

  // Check EEPROM for default initialization
  bool shouldInit = false;
  for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
    if (EEPROM.read(i) == 0xFF) {
      shouldInit = true;
      break;
    }
  }
  for (int i = 60; i < 64; i++) {
    if (EEPROM.read(i) == 0xFF) {
      shouldInit = true;
      break;
    }
  }
  for (int i = 64; i < 66; i++) {
    if (EEPROM.read(i) == 0xFF) {
      shouldInit = true;
      break;
    }
  }

  if (shouldInit) {
    String defaultPass = "1234";
    for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) EEPROM.write(i, defaultPass[i]);

    String defaultDiesel = "0045";
    for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) EEPROM.write(60 + i, defaultDiesel[i]);

    String defaultTime = "10";
    for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++) EEPROM.write(64 + i, defaultTime[i]);

    EEPROM.commit();
    Serial.println("EEPROM initialized with default values.");
  }
}


void setupTime() {
  // GMT+5:30 for India (19800 seconds)
  configTime(19800, 0, "pool.ntp.org", "time.nist.gov");

  struct tm timeinfo;
  if (!getLocalTime(&timeinfo)) {
    Serial.println("Failed to get time");
    return;
  }

  // Format date as "YYYY-MM-DD"
  strftime(dateStr, sizeof(dateStr), "%Y-%m-%d", &timeinfo);

  Serial.print("Stored Date: ");
  Serial.println(dateStr);  // Example: 2025-07-29
}


// --- WhatsApp API Function ---
void sendSmsApiRequest(String systemUID ,String dosingDateStr, String dosingStartTime, String dosingEndTime, String dieselQty, String phoneNumber) {
  String phone = phoneNumber;
  String uid = systemUID;
  String startTime = dosingStartTime;
  String endTime = dosingEndTime;
  String qty = dieselQty;
  String name = "IONIC_BOOST";
  String date = dosingDateStr;

  // Encode Params properly if they contain special characters
  String params = uid + "," + date + "," + startTime + "," + endTime + "," + qty;

  String url = "https://bhashsms.com/api/sendmsgutil.php";
  url += "?user=terion_123";
  url += "&pass=123456";
  url += "&sender=BUZWAP";
  url += "&phone=" + phone;
  url += "&text=terion_iconic";
  url += "&priority=wa";
  url += "&stype=normal";
  url += "&Params=" + params;

  Serial.println("Calling URL:");
  Serial.println(url);

  HTTPClient http;
  http.begin(url);

  int httpResponseCode = http.GET();

  if (httpResponseCode > 0) {
    Serial.print("HTTP Response code: ");
    Serial.println(httpResponseCode);
    String response = http.getString();
    Serial.println("SMS API Response:");
    Serial.println(response);
  } else {
    Serial.print("Error on sending GET: ");
    Serial.println(httpResponseCode);
  }

  http.end();
}

void reconnectMQTT() {
  while (!mqttClient.connected()) {
    Serial.print("Attempting MQTT connection...");
    String clientId = "ESP32Client-" + String(random(0xffff), HEX);
    if (mqttClient.connect(clientId.c_str())) {
      Serial.println(" Connected to MQTT!");
    } else {
      Serial.print(" Failed, rc=");
      Serial.print(mqttClient.state());
      Serial.println(" try again in 5s");
      delay(5000);
    }
  }
}

void beepOnce() {
  digitalWrite(BUZZER, LOW);
  delay(300);
  digitalWrite(BUZZER, HIGH);
}

void beepTwice() {
  for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
    digitalWrite(BUZZER, LOW);   // LOW = buzzer ON
    delay(300);
    digitalWrite(BUZZER, HIGH);  // HIGH = buzzer OFF
    delay(200);
  }
  digitalWrite(BUZZER, HIGH); // Make sure it's off at the end
}

void loop() {
  if (!mqttClient.connected()) reconnectMQTT();
  mqttClient.loop();
  server.handleClient();
  updateOLEDStatus();

  if (motorRunning && !dosingPaused && millis() - motorStartTime >= motorDuration) {
    digitalWrite(RELAY1, LOW);
    digitalWrite(RELAY2, LOW);
    motorRunning = false;
    beepOnce(); 
    statusChangeTime = millis();
    statusDisplayed = false;

    if (uiPage == "priming_started") {
      uiPage = "priming_menu";
      inDosingPhase = true;
      inputBuffer = "";
    } else if (uiPage == "dosing_motor") {
        // Capture end time
        time_t now = time(nullptr);
        struct tm* timeinfo = localtime(&now);

        char timeBuf[9]; // HH:MM:SS
        strftime(timeBuf, sizeof(timeBuf), "%H:%M:%S", timeinfo);
        dosingEndTimeStr = String(timeBuf);

        // Create custom JSON
        StaticJsonDocument<256> doc;
        doc["UID"] = systemUID;
        doc["Date"] = dosingDateStr;
        doc["Dosing_Start_Time"] = dosingStartTimeStr;
        doc["Dosing_End_Time"] = dosingEndTimeStr;
        doc["Diesel_Quantity_Used"] = String(dieselQty.toInt() * 0.008899, 2); // assuming ml to liters

        char buffer[256];
        serializeJson(doc, buffer);
        bool success = mqttClient.publish(mqtt_topic_status, buffer);
        Serial.print("MQTT Publish (Dosing Done): ");
        String name = "IONIC_BOOST"; // or set dynamically
        String uid = systemUID;
        String date = dosingDateStr; // Replace with RTC if available
        String startTime = dosingStartTimeStr;  // If tracked
        String endTime = dosingEndTimeStr;    // If tracked
        String qty =  String(dieselQty.toInt() * 0.008899, 2);

        // Send to all mobiles
        sendSmsApiRequest(systemUID, dosingDateStr, dosingStartTimeStr, dosingEndTimeStr, dieselQty, systemMobile);
        sendSmsApiRequest(systemUID, dosingDateStr, dosingStartTimeStr, dosingEndTimeStr, dieselQty, mobile1);
        sendSmsApiRequest(systemUID, dosingDateStr, dosingStartTimeStr, dosingEndTimeStr, dieselQty, mobile2);
        sendSmsApiRequest(systemUID, dosingDateStr, dosingStartTimeStr, dosingEndTimeStr, dieselQty, mobile3);
        Serial.println(success ? "‚úÖ Success" : "‚ùå Failed");

        // Display on OLED
        display.clearDisplay();
        display.setCursor(0, 0);
        display.setTextSize(1);
        display.println("Dosing Completed");
        display.println("Date: " + dosingDateStr);
        display.println("Start: " + dosingStartTimeStr);
        display.println("End: " + dosingEndTimeStr);
        display.println("Diesel: " + String(dieselQty.toInt() * 0.008899, 2) + " L");
        display.display();

        beepTwice();
        statusChangeTime = millis();
        uiPage = "priming_menu";
        inDosingPhase = false;

        beepTwice();

        display.clearDisplay();
        display.setCursor(0, 0);
        display.setTextSize(1);
        display.println("Dosing Completed");
        display.println("Date: " + dosingDateStr);
        display.println("Start: " + dosingStartTimeStr);
        display.println("End: " + dosingEndTimeStr);
        display.println("Diesel: " + String(dieselQty.toInt() * 0.008899, 2) + " L");
        display.display();

        statusChangeTime = millis();
        uiPage = "priming_menu";
        inDosingPhase = false;
      }
  else if (uiPage == "depriming_started") {
    StaticJsonDocument<200> doc;
    doc["status"] = "Depriming Stopped";
    doc["priming_time"] = primingTime;
    char buffer[256];
    serializeJson(doc, buffer);
    //mqttClient.publish(mqtt_topic_status, buffer);

    uiPage = "welcome";            
    dosingPaused = false;
    remainingDosingTime = 0;

    isDeprimingInProgress = false;   
    deprimingCompleted = true;
}


    // OLED: Show done
    display.clearDisplay();
    display.setCursor(0, 0);
    display.println("Motor Stopped");
    display.display();
  }

}

void handleRoot() {
  server.send(200, "text/html", getHtmlPage());
}

void handleKeyPress() {
  String key = server.arg("key");

  if (uiPage == "welcome") {
    if (key == "5") {
      digitalWrite(TORCH, !digitalRead(TORCH));
    } else if (key == "*") {
      uiPage = "password";
      inputBuffer = "";
    } else if (key == "1" || key == "8") {
      powerOffSeq += key;
      if (powerOffSeq == "18") {
        uiPage = "power_off";
        powerOffSeq = "";
      } else if (powerOffSeq.length() > 2) {
        powerOffSeq = "";
      }
    } else if (key == "B") {
      uiPage = "admin_auth";
      adminBuffer = "";
    }

  } else if (uiPage == "admin_auth") {
    if (key == "#") {
      if (adminBuffer == sysPassword) {
        uiPage = "select_menu";
      } else {
        uiPage = "wrong_pass";
      }
      adminBuffer = "";
    } else if (key == "*") {
      adminBuffer = "";
      uiPage = "welcome";
    } else if (key == "C") {
      inputBuffer = "";  
    } else if (key.length() == 1 && adminBuffer.length() < 4) {
      adminBuffer += key;
    }

  } else if (uiPage == "select_menu") {
    if (key == "1") {
    uiPage = "choose_mobile_to_edit";
    inputBuffer = "";
    editingMobile = 0;
  } else if (key == "2") {
      uiPage = "password_edit_menu"; 
      inputBuffer = "";
    }else if (key == "C") {
      inputBuffer = "";  // Clear the input when 'C' is pressed
  }else if (key == "#") {
      uiPage = "welcome";
    }

  }else if (uiPage == "password_edit_menu") {
  if (key == "1") {
    uiPage = "edit_admin_password";
    inputBuffer = "";
  } else if (key == "2") {
    uiPage = "edit_dosing_password";
    inputBuffer = "";
  }else if (key == "C") {
      inputBuffer = "";  // Clear the input when 'C' is pressed
  }
   else if (key == "*") {
    uiPage = "select_menu";
  }
} else if (uiPage == "choose_mobile_to_edit") {
  if (key == "1") {
    editingMobile = 1;
    inputBuffer = "";
    uiPage = "edit_mobile";
  } else if (key == "2") {
    editingMobile = 2;
    inputBuffer = "";
    uiPage = "edit_mobile";
  }else if (key == "C") {
      inputBuffer = "";  // Clear the input when 'C' is pressed
  }else if (key == "*") {
      uiPage = "select_menu";
  }
}
  else if (uiPage == "edit_mobile") {
  if (key == "#") {
    if (inputBuffer.length() == 10 &&
        inputBuffer != mobile1 &&
        !inputBuffer.startsWith(" ") &&
        inputBuffer.indexOf(' ') == -1) {

      bool isValid = true;
      for (char c : inputBuffer) {
        if (!isDigit(c)) {
          isValid = false;
          break;
        }
      }

      if (isValid && editingMobile != 0) {
        if (editingMobile == 1) {
          mobile2 = inputBuffer;
          for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) EEPROM.write(30 + i, mobile2[i]);
        } else if (editingMobile == 2) {
          mobile3 = inputBuffer;
          for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) EEPROM.write(40 + i, mobile3[i]);
        }

        EEPROM.commit();
        inputBuffer = "";
        editingMobile = 0;
        uiPage = "choose_mobile_to_edit"; // ‚úÖ Go back after editing
      }
    }

  } else if (isDigit(key[0]) && inputBuffer.length() < 10) {
    inputBuffer += key;

  } else if (key == "C") {
    inputBuffer = ""; // ‚úÖ Clear input

  } else if (key == "*") {
    inputBuffer = "";
    editingMobile = 0;
    uiPage = "choose_mobile_to_edit"; // ‚úÖ Back to mobile selection
  }
}
 else if (uiPage == "password") {
  if (key == "#") {
    if (inputBuffer == dosingPassword) {
      dieselQty = dieselQty;
      primingTime = primingTime;
      motorDirection = true;
      inDosingPhase = false;

      startMotor("priming");
      
    } else {
      uiPage = "wrong_pass";
    }
    inputBuffer = "";
  }
  else if (key == "C") {
    inputBuffer = "";  // Clear input
  }
  else if (key == "*") {
    inputBuffer = "";  // Clear input
    uiPage = "welcome";  // Go back to welcome
  }
  else if (key.length() == 1 && inputBuffer.length() < 4) {
    inputBuffer += key;  // Append digit/letter
  }
}
  else if (uiPage == "priming_menu") {
  if (key == "A") {
    uiPage = "edit_diesel";
  } else if (key == "B") {
    primingBPressed = true;
    uiPage = "edit_priming";
  } else if (key == "D" && !motorRunning && !dosingPaused) {
    motorDirection = true;
    inDosingPhase = true;

    // Calculate calibration time
    float calibratedTime = dieselQty.toInt() * 0.8899;
    motorDuration = (unsigned long)(calibratedTime * 1000);
    motorStartTime = millis();
    motorRunning = true;

    struct tm timeinfo;
    if (getLocalTime(&timeinfo)) {
      char buffer[10];
      strftime(buffer, sizeof(buffer), "%H:%M:%S", &timeinfo);
      dosingStartTimeStr = String(buffer);
    }

    StaticJsonDocument<200> doc;
    doc["status"] = "Dosing Started";
    doc["diesel_quantity"] = dieselQty;
    doc["priming_time"] = String(calibratedTime, 2);
    char buffer[256];
    serializeJson(doc, buffer);
    //mqttClient.publish(mqtt_topic_status, buffer);

    digitalWrite(RELAY1, HIGH);  // +12V
    digitalWrite(RELAY2, LOW);   // GND
    beepOnce(); 

    uiPage = "dosing_motor";

  } else if (key == "#" && !motorRunning && !isDeprimingInProgress && key.length() == 1){
    // üîÅ Start depriming
    motorDirection = false; // Reverse direction
    motorDuration = primingTime.toInt() * 1000;
    motorStartTime = millis();
    motorRunning = true;
    isDeprimingInProgress = true;
    inDosingPhase = false;

    StaticJsonDocument<200> doc;
    doc["status"] = "Depriming Started";
    doc["priming_time"] = primingTime;
    char buffer[256];
    serializeJson(doc, buffer);
    //mqttClient.publish(mqtt_topic_status, buffer);

    digitalWrite(RELAY1, LOW);   // GND ‚úÖ
    digitalWrite(RELAY2, HIGH);  // + 12ve
    beepOnce();

    uiPage = "depriming_started";
  }
}

 else if (uiPage == "dosing_motor") {
    if (key == "C") {
      if (motorRunning && !dosingPaused) {
        digitalWrite(RELAY1, LOW);
        digitalWrite(RELAY2, LOW);
        dosingPaused = true;
        motorRunning = false;
        beepOnce();
        remainingDosingTime = motorDuration - (millis() - motorStartTime);

        display.clearDisplay();
        display.setCursor(0, 0);
        display.println("Dosing Paused");
        display.display();
      } else if (!motorRunning && dosingPaused) {
        motorDuration = remainingDosingTime;
        motorStartTime = millis();
        motorRunning = true;
        dosingPaused = false;
        beepOnce();

        digitalWrite(RELAY1, HIGH);
        digitalWrite(RELAY2, LOW);

        display.clearDisplay();
        display.setCursor(0, 0);
        display.println("Dosing Resumed");
        display.display();
      }
    }
  } else if (uiPage == "edit_password") {
    if (key == "#" && inputBuffer.length() == 4) {
      sysPassword = inputBuffer;
      for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) EEPROM.write(i, sysPassword[i]);
      EEPROM.commit();
      uiPage = "priming_menu";
      inputBuffer = "";
    } else if (key.length() == 1 && inputBuffer.length() < 4) {
      inputBuffer += key;
    }
    else if (key == "C") {
    inputBuffer = "";  // Clear the input when 'C' is pressed
  }
  else if (key == "*") {
    inputBuffer = "";
    uiPage = "priming_menu"; // or "select_menu" depending on your flow
  }
  } else if (uiPage == "edit_diesel") {
  if (key == "#" && inputBuffer.length() > 0) {
    int qty = inputBuffer.toInt();

    if (qty < 20 || qty > 2000) {
      uiPage = "diesel_error";
      inputBuffer = "";
    } else {
      while (inputBuffer.length() < 4) inputBuffer = "0" + inputBuffer;
      dieselQty = inputBuffer;

      // ‚úÖ Save dieselQty to EEPROM (address 60 to 63)
      for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) EEPROM.write(60 + i, dieselQty[i]);
      EEPROM.commit();  // Important!
      Serial.println("Diesel committed: " + dieselQty);

      inputBuffer = "";
      uiPage = "priming_menu";
    }
  } else if (isDigit(key[0]) && inputBuffer.length() < 4) {
    inputBuffer += key;
  } else if (key == "C") {
    inputBuffer = "";
  } else if (key == "*") {
    inputBuffer = "";
    uiPage = "priming_menu";
  }
}
else if (uiPage == "diesel_error") {
  if (key == "*") {
    inputBuffer = "";
    uiPage = "priming_menu";
  }
}
 else if (uiPage == "edit_priming") {
    if (key == "#" && inputBuffer.length() > 0) {
      // Ensure it's always 2 digits (e.g., "05")
      while (inputBuffer.length() < 2) inputBuffer = "0" + inputBuffer;

      primingTime = inputBuffer;

      // Write to EEPROM (index 20, 21)
      for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
        EEPROM.write(64 + i, primingTime[i]);
      }
        EEPROM.commit();

        uiPage = "priming_menu";
       inputBuffer = "";
    } else if (isDigit(key[0]) && inputBuffer.length() < 2) {
      inputBuffer += key;
    }
    else if (key == "*") {
    inputBuffer = "";
    uiPage = "priming_menu"; // or "select_menu" depending on your flow
  }
    else if (key == "C") {
      inputBuffer = "";  // Clear the input when 'C' is pressed
  }
  } else if (uiPage == "dosing") {
    if (key == "#" && inputBuffer.length() > 0) {
      dieselQty = inputBuffer;
      for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) EEPROM.write(60 + i, dieselQty[i]);
      EEPROM.commit();
      inputBuffer = "";

      motorDirection = true;
      startMotor("dosing");
    } else if (isDigit(key[0]) && inputBuffer.length() < 4) {
      inputBuffer += key;
    }

  }else if (uiPage == "edit_admin_password") {
  if (key == "#" && inputBuffer.length() == 4) {
    sysPassword = inputBuffer;
    for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) EEPROM.write(i, sysPassword[i]);
    EEPROM.commit();
    inputBuffer = "";
    uiPage = "select_menu";
  }else if (key == "C") {
      inputBuffer = "";  // Clear the input when 'C' is pressed
  }
   else if (key.length() == 1 && inputBuffer.length() < 4) {
    inputBuffer += key;
  } else if (key == "*") {
    inputBuffer = "";
    uiPage = "select_menu";
  }
}
else if (uiPage == "edit_dosing_password") {
  if (key == "#" && inputBuffer.length() == 4) {
    dosingPassword = inputBuffer;
    for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) EEPROM.write(50 + i, dosingPassword[i]);
    EEPROM.commit();
    inputBuffer = "";
    uiPage = "select_menu";
  }else if (key == "C") {
      inputBuffer = "";  // Clear the input when 'C' is pressed
  }
   else if (key.length() == 1 && inputBuffer.length() < 4) {
    inputBuffer += key;
  } else if (key == "*") {
    inputBuffer = "";
    uiPage = "select_menu";
  }
}
  server.sendHeader("Location", "/", true);
  server.send(302, "text/plain", "Redirecting...");
}

void startMotor(String taskType) {
  motorDuration = primingTime.toInt() * 1000;
  motorStartTime = millis();
  motorRunning = true;

  StaticJsonDocument<200> doc;
  doc["diesel_quantity"] = dieselQty;
  doc["priming_time"] = primingTime;

  // Determine direction
  if (taskType == "priming") {
    doc["status"] = "Priming Started";
    beepOnce();
    uiPage = "priming_started";

    // Forward: RELAY1 = HIGH (+12V), RELAY2 = LOW (GND)
    Serial.println("Activating relay...");
    digitalWrite(RELAY1, HIGH);
    Serial.println("Relay activated.");
    digitalWrite(RELAY2, LOW);

  } else if (taskType == "depriming") {
    doc["status"] = "Depriming Started";
    beepOnce();
    uiPage = "depriming_started";

    // Reverse: RELAY1 = LOW (GND), RELAY2 = HIGH (+12V)
    digitalWrite(RELAY1, LOW);
    digitalWrite(RELAY2, HIGH);

  } else if (taskType == "dosing") {
    doc["status"] = "Dosing Started";
    beepOnce();
    uiPage = "dosing_motor";
    inDosingPhase = true;
    uiPage = "welcome";

    // You can set default direction if needed
    digitalWrite(RELAY1, HIGH);
    digitalWrite(RELAY2, LOW);
  }

  char buffer[256];
  serializeJson(doc, buffer);
  //mqttClient.publish(mqtt_topic_status, buffer);

  display.clearDisplay();
  display.setCursor(0, 0);
  display.setTextSize(1);
  display.println(doc["status"].as<String>());
  display.println("Diesel: " + dieselQty);
  display.println("Time: " + primingTime + "s");
  display.display();
}

void updateOLEDStatus() {
  if (!motorRunning && !dosingPaused) return;

  unsigned long remaining = 0;
  if (motorRunning) {
    remaining = max(0UL, motorDuration - (millis() - motorStartTime));
  } else if (dosingPaused) {
    remaining = remainingDosingTime;
  }

  // Convert milliseconds to MM:SS:MS format
  unsigned int minutes = remaining / 60000;
  unsigned int seconds = (remaining % 60000) / 1000;
  unsigned int milliseconds = (remaining % 1000) / 10; // 2-digit ms

  String timeStr = String(minutes) + ":" +
                   (seconds < 10 ? "0" : "") + String(seconds) + ":" +
                   (milliseconds < 10 ? "0" : "") + String(milliseconds);

  String totalTimeStr = String(motorDuration / 60000) + ":" +
                        ((motorDuration % 60000) / 1000 < 10 ? "0" : "") +
                        String((motorDuration % 60000) / 1000) + ":" +
                        "00";  // Always ends with ":00" since total doesn't include ms

  String operation = "";
  if (uiPage == "priming_started") operation = "Priming";
  else if (uiPage == "depriming_started") operation = "Depriming";
  else if (uiPage == "dosing_motor") operation = "Dosing";

  display.clearDisplay();
  display.setTextSize(1);
  display.setCursor(0, 0);
  display.println("Op: " + operation);
  display.println("Time Left: " + timeStr);
  display.println("Total: " + totalTimeStr);
  display.println("Diesel: " + dieselQty);
  if (dosingPaused) {
    display.setTextColor(WHITE, BLACK);
    display.println("Paused");
  }
  display.display();
}
